# Data Analysis Toolkit for Food and Nutrition Sciences ü¶õ

Welcome to the **Data Analysis Toolkit for Food and Nutrition Sciences**, a comprehensive resource for MSc students mastering data analysis in nutrition research. This toolkit features 27 Jupyter notebooks across six modules, rendered as interactive HTML tutorials using Quarto and hosted on GitHub Pages. Run the notebooks in Google Colab with one click or explore the rendered tutorials below. With hippo-themed datasets (ü¶õ), it covers Python basics, data handling, statistical analysis, advanced methods, and qualitative research.

## Quick Start üöÄ

- **View the Site**: Browse tutorials at [https://ggkuhnle.github.io/data-analysis-toolkit-FNS/](https://ggkuhnle.github.io/data-analysis-toolkit-FNS/).
- **Run in Colab**: Use the "Open in Colab" badges below to run notebooks in the cloud.
- **Syllabus**: See the full course outline at [syllabus.html](syllabus.html).
- **GitHub**: Clone or fork the repo at [github.com/ggkuhnle/data-analysis-toolkit-FNS](https://github.com/ggkuhnle/data-analysis-toolkit-FNS).

## Modules üìö

Explore the six modules, each with notebooks you can view as HTML or run in Colab:

- **Infrastructure**  
  Set up Python, Jupyter, and Quarto for data analysis.  
  [Explore Module](notebooks/01_infrastructure/)

- **Programming Python**  
  Master Python syntax and programming basics.  
  [Explore Module](notebooks/02_programming_basics/) 

- **Data Handling**  
  Import, clean, and transform nutrition datasets.  
  [Explore Module](notebooks/03_data_handling/) 

- **Data Analysis**  
  Visualise data and build regression models.  
  [Explore Module](notebooks/04_data_analysis/) 

- **Advanced Topics**  
  Dive into Bayesian methods, SQL, and dashboards.
  [Explore Module](notebooks/05_advanced/) 

- **Qualitative Research**  
  Analyse text data for nutrition studies.  
  [Explore Module](notebooks/06_qualitative/) 

- **Mini projects**
  Some mini projects, e.g. RCT
  [Explore Module](notebooks/10_mini_projects/)

## Get Involved üßë‚Äçüíª

- **Clone the Repo**:
  ```bash
  git clone https://github.com/ggkuhnle/data-analysis-toolkit-FNS.git
  cd data-analysis-toolkit-FNS
  ```
- **Set Up Locally**:
  ```bash
  python -m venv venv
  source venv/bin/activate  # On Windows: venv\Scripts\activate
  pip install -r requirements.txt
  ```
  Install Quarto: [quarto.org](https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/).
- **Render Locally**:
  ```bash
  rm -rf _site/
  quarto render
  ```
